metadata.title: USN-4848-1 -- mini_httpd vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that ACME mini_httpd did not properly handle HTTP GET requests with empty headers. A remote attacker could use this vulnerability to read arbitrary files.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4848-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  mini-httpd - 1.23-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
